"You had your scandal. Charlie Sheen has his scandal. They keep hiring you guys. Me, I got fired. They took me to court and sued me. What did I do wrong? I mentioned where I work... You guys are up to shenanigans I'm back stage looking over everyone going: "Did you have sex with David Letterman ?"." Howard Stern was sued by CBS in 2006 when the company accused him of using his terrestrial radio air time to promote his new satellite radio gig at Sirius.
